biography: Glenn Gilbertti is an American professional wrestler, best known for his appearances with World Championship Wrestling (WCW) as Disco Inferno (later changed to Disqo). He is also a former road agent for Total Nonstop Action Wrestling.  During his six-year tenure with WCW, Gilbertti became a one-time Cruiserweight Champion, a two-time Television Champion and a one-time World Tag Team Champion with Alex Wright, as part of the tag team Boogie Knights.
name: Glenn Gilbertti
